name: Maternal Near Miss Review Form
description: A form for collecting maternal near miss information

questions.label: ANC Profile (Tick the ones conducted and note down the results)
What was the result of the VDRL test?
What were the results for Protein?
Mothers condition Prior to onset of labor
If Referred, Name and level of referring Health Facility
Family planning methods used by the patient
Underlying causes of maternal near miss

answers.label: Intubation and ventilation not related to anaesthesia
Oliguria non responsive to fluids or diuretics
Transfusion of > 5 units of blood / red cells
Jaundice in the presence of preeclampsia
Loss of consciousness and the presence of glucose and ketoacids in urine

sections.label: Summary of the maternal near miss,interventions and management
